definition: to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: Fancy hotels are beginning to accommodate both man and pets.
sentences.chinese: 一些别出心裁的饭店已经开始同时留宿人和宠物。

sentences.english: This unique gift will make them unforgetable.
sentences.chinese: 这种别出心裁的“纪念礼物”，将会让他们终身难忘。

sentences.english: Time is the most merciless to small pattern different from the usual pattern.
sentences.chinese: 时间对于别出心裁的小花样是最无情的。

sentences.english: There are endless combinations possible with “Misfits.”
sentences.chinese: “别出心裁”沙发有无穷的组合。

definition: to display originality (idiom); to do things differently
having a unique or distinctive style
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
lit. new bud/fig. new and original
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to conform to no conventional pattern/unconventional/offbeat
variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]
unusual/unique
ingenious/clever/ingenuity/artifice
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
not follow the beaten track/have an original style
new idea
a pleasant change/a breath of fresh air/refreshing
endlessly interesting (idiom)/very witty

to start sth new or original (idiom); to break a new path/to break fresh ground
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
